comments: Number of compositions of n into parts 8 and 9. [_Joerg Arndt_, Jun 29 2013]
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,0,0,0,0,0,1,1).
formula: a(n) = a(n-8) +a(n-9) for n>8. - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jun 28 2013
prog: (MAGMA) m:=80; R<x>:=PowerSeriesRing(Integers(), m); Coefficients(R!(1/(1-x^8-x^9))); /* or */ I:=[1,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,1]; [n le 9 select I[n] else Self(n-8)+Self(n-9): n in [1..80]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jun 28 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
